author: admin
title: Research and Markets: 2015 U.S. Cameras (Studio, H/DSLR, Other) Market Report
text:
Vertical End User Markets Covered: 
- Broadcast Television 
- Video Post Production / Film Post Production 
- Video Production / Film Production 
- Institutional Video (Government Video, Educational Video, Medical Video) 
Key Topics Covered: 
Quantitative Data Table: Past Year, Current Year, Next Year: 
1. Total Broadcast/Pro Video Facilities, Total and by Vertical Market 
2. Total Broadcast/Pro Video Facilities Purchasing Product Type 
3. Penetration - percentage of Broadcast/Pro Video facilities in each vertical market purchasing 
4. Total Market Value / Market Size in Dollars 
5. Total Units Purchased 
6. Average number of Units Purchased per facility 
7. Average Price of Units Purchased
